Blog.post: Yo..Today i wake up at 11am+ n on my com,then played warcraft's custom game named dota..Sian,playing with noobs still can win..LOL..After playing for 1 hour i went back to slp again..Haha..Slp until 3pm+ then wake up..1 of my fren called me n meet me to go for lion dance training..Haiz..Always lion dance..-_-" Nvm..After tat training we went down to help out the shen tang..Tml still need to go out..Woo~..Hmm..Now got time so i writing this lor..Haiz..Don hav long xian accompany me to play games cos he had exams..Haiz..Hmm..Girls?To me jus another headache..Haha..Cos my past gfs always giv me headache..Haha..Tat's y i broke up with them..Hmm..The most recent wan gave me the most headache lor..Haiz..Then now i broke up with her,she still add me in msn,call my hp,add me at frenster..WTF? But i reject all of it..Wahahah...All i wan is freedom,when 2 person is in a relationship,pls giv the other party some freedom..They are not birds tat u mus put them inside a cage ok??Haiz..Now almost sch reopen n still same class with tat girl...Sian...Now having a headache tinking how to face her..Probably jus Bo Chap her..Wahahah..U may wondering y i treat her like tat...Haha..Next time i'll write it down all the stupid things she had done to me...Gtg slp liao..Bye~...

Haiz..Today i wake up bout 2pm+ almost 3pm cos i promised my fren to help out at his shen tang..Haiz..But playful me wan to play computer games so i went there later bout 8pm then reached there..lol..When reached there,I saw my another fren who went to NS recently n wondering y he was there?_? Then i saw his leg was bandaged n i noe wad's the reason behind it...(maybe he 'play dirty'?)=P Nvm..Haiz..After helping out over there,we went to hav a bite n went home after tat..It's bout 11+pm almost 12am and i decided to call my fren SM n call her to talk to me..Haha..Accompany me talk till i reached home..lol..Then LX happen to call me n we had a conference talk..Hmm..Talk bout many things..But i'm the only one who talk the less..Haha..We hang up bout 2.45am..After tat i went for my bath n now i'm writing tis cos now there is no one bugging me=P Talk bout me,I'm the most unromantic guy in the world:| Some girls left me bcos of tat reason..Haiz..My weakness is girls..Whenever my frens disturb me by telling a girl tat i wanted her number,I would scream n shout n scold my fren n i would feel my face burning..lol..Y cant i bring out more courage facing girls?Haiz..Maybe i'm shy from the day i'm created n landed on this world..^_^Gtg play more games now..Write till here..Good nite..@_@

Haiz..Missed 1 day to update my stupid blog liao...Haha..Cos my bro yester came back from his tekong camp..Then until today then write this lor..Hmm...Today wake up @11+ then ate my breakfast after tat went back to be pig again..LOL..Haiz..Now then came back from lion dance training...Tml still need to go to my fren's Shen Tang help out..Sian..Nth much to say liao lor..Tml then continue bahz..Gtg bath le..

Another day is spent by me aimlessly...Done nth today...Haiz...Jus wake up bout 10+ n miss warcraft's touney(tournament) then played a match of dota then went back to slp...LOL..About 6smth my fren called me up n say want to go do some lion dance's stuff again..Haiz..Did some painting over there...LOL...Heng got LX accommany me on the fone arbo i'll b no mood to go down at all..Haha...Reached home bout 11+ then went to bath..After tat on my com n play...played GB with LX,SM,YW,BY..Quite fun..Haiz..At bout this time all nv play liao so i'm free to add new post to my blog lor..haha..

LOL..@4am+ When i play finish GB with LX and i saw his msg...He msg me in msn say tat he also got 1 blog...haha...Please support his blog..The Add is www.xbigfatpigx.blogspot.com...By the way, he's not as ugly as shit,he wrote tat in his blog is because he tinks tat he's a shit...Haha...So Jinhui don always sae u are a shit ok??

Well... Nothing much lor... Cos yesterday jus created this thing..Then like a bit fun so now type lor.. Haha..Now is 2.20am(My Com's time) n i jus reached home from lion dance training@Yio Chu Kang..Wah lao~Damn far sia...Jus now when training got lots of fun n laughter..Cos some unhappiness happened n now tink is over le bah..Haiz...Then now at home,B4 going to game with long xian now write this thing lor...Arbo quite plain lo...Haha...
http://www.lxlxllx.blogspot.com/
Because I jus wanted to add a command to LX's posting n it made me make mine as well... -_Z...

Haiz...Today,I decided to start a new day despite wad happened yester..Going to put all unhappiness behind me!!! Haha...Haiz..Today morning of sch I feel down lor..Don like to talk cos very tired..Yester 3am then slp..Then today 6.30am wake up..Wahahaha..Am I God?? LOL..Haha...Yester in sch met this indian fellow who likes to scold fuck you..Haha..Tink he got a baby face lor..Quite interesting bitch..LOL..Learned some Indian Language from him..Haha..But only noe 1 sentence tat is "I love you" in Eng..Haha..Quite boliao rite?? Cos yester got 2hr break..Nth to do so need to find smth to make ppl laugh lar..Waahahhahaa...Then today,I call him Hey Fucker!! Haha..I scold him like tat bcos he likes to fuck ppl ma..Haha..In canteen during our break today, he suddenly ask me wad number i play wan? Then i reply him does it matters?? haha.. Now,in this century,wad is gang?? Correct?? Anyone also can become gangster..It's a matter that whether u wana be one or not lor..Haha...Really not interested in this kind of things liao..Haiz..Gtg play gb with LX liao..BB..

Everything seems like going against me.!.!.! Firstly,my gunbound acc was being hacked by some fuckers!!! KNN!! Damn dulan lor..Cos i got 175,000 gold man..Almost can get my archangel clothes liao..Damn pissed jus now..Then nvm..Went for training..Fren did stunt on me..Keep me waited for 30mins and didn eat my dinner jus to be steady to meet him..WTF?? Then when reached there they made a fool of me..(does not wan to elaborate more) -_- Haiz...Now my mood jus came back lor...Bcos play warcraft with zy..Won 3 rounds but lose 1 round..Haiz...But nvm..I won 1 solo n 1 RT..Using my newly account=UnLuCKyAnGeL I made this acc is bcos i'm down on my luck..Angel of Bad Luck like is "guarding" me...Btw,Thank You "ANGEL"... I maybe smiling to all ppl..But inside i felt uneasy..I don want to make other ppl feel down jus bcos of me..Wana see all my fren to be happy... Will there be anyone who can understand me??? -.-

Now got free time so now update lor..Haha..Long time nv write liao..Today in sch quite boliao..Nv much happened this few days..Oh..I jus remember..Now warcraft have many noobs leh...Sian..Always karna those nooby partner then lose..Haiz..Dono when i can really get a nice n good account..~_~ Only can wait lor..Now chiong my best race which is UD..Long time nv play this race liao..Cos always fooling around..Haha..Haiz..Today hav to go LD training..Bobian..Cos i nv go since sunday..Haha..Hmm.. And 1 thing..I really miss those sec sch days lor..Now my sch is not as steady as sec sch frens..Sian..Whenever u scold smth vulgar they sae"Don scold can anot??" Wahahah...Very act high class leh...Haiz..Really not like last time can shout n play together..Now,my class many ppl wana be leader?? Haiz..Let them be lor..I jus go sch slack liao..Don wana care too much..Wad i wan now is HAPPY!! Haha.. Better play more wc b4 i go training..Bye..Take Care~!!!

Haha..Now..I hav 1 more GB kaki liao lor..He's my sch fren..Name is Yi Siong..But i always call him Ying Xiong de lor..Haha..He quite ok la..Guai kia lor..Btw,he's the guai kia who psyco me to become good de la..Wahahah...But will i really become good?? lol..Hard to say bah..Now i can control my temper lor..Not so easily angry liao..My Sec Sch frens noe rite??Haha..Wahah..He learn very fast leh..Jus now train with him although he always lose..He also got win me leh..Tink 2-3 rounds lor..Cos Yihao message me in msn,sending our pictures lor..Haha..Dono y,nowadays like to take photo..LOL..Tink this happen after taking with Yihao at Bishan bah..1st of sch..LOL..Now gtg slp liao..Really buey ta han liao..Going to hav a god damn rest liao..^_^ Take Care everyone..

Haiz..Jus played few rounds of WC..Then come blog lor..Now talking to my ite fren..Haha..Hmm..Dono y I will suddenly tink of this person..I simply canot figure out lor..This happen very long liao..But there's no1 could tell me lor..Not even this fren who is talking to me now..Haha..Some ppl call me to ask her straight away..Don care others tinking..Yes..I noe.. I can don care others tinking but wad bout her?? She really innocent lor..Can tink more than tat lor..I tink she will tink of others' opinion rather than mine lor..Haiz..Quite sad..Now..I can only let fate decide whether we can be together anot..Not seeing her i can forget her..But once i saw her,my feelings for her came back..Don really noe wad's the matter of me lor..Even now,a girl appoarched me i won accept de lor..I'll jus wait for her..Until she got married or found a guy who really take care of her..Tink i won't be married soon bah..Jus wait~!~! ='(

Wahahah..Yester too tired to blog so today blog now lor..Haha..Now I'm in sch to do the blogging..Actually yester wana do blogging wan..Then too tired to do cos yester woke up at 6am to go chu shi..Cos they wan the exact amount of ppl to chu lor..Hmm..I met my fren bout 6.45 am at the bus stop then we took cab to there..Cos 7am need to reach the shi guan lor..Nth much happened during chu shi..After tat..6 ppl went to buy some things for the coming LD competition..Cos we still hav 1 more team of girls taking part..So we helping them to buy their things lor..Haiz..We went to beach road the army market to search for 2 red long sleeve t-shirt..While we are searching,I also mention tat we also need shoe laces..Hmm..1 of my fren very aunty leh..He can bargain very well..Haha..For the 1st shop,they selling $5/pair..Siao bo..So expensive..Then he asked the uncle can lower anot..Then the uncle refused n he said loudly"Next!!!" Then we walked a few steps the uncle called us back..Haha..And still he offered the price not suitable lor..Then we go other shop and see..Walk n walk then saw the 2nd shop which is a china uncle..Starting price is $3/pair..Then the 'aunty' staight away shouted $1.50/lace lor..Haha..Then the 5 of us at there do background bargain lor..Here shouted $1/lace,The other side shout $0.50/lace..Haha..The uncle's expression turned lor..LOL..After tat..We cant find the red t-shirt,we went to Mustafa to search..In the end also don hav..Haiz..Then went to one coffeeshop to rest cos we hav been walking under the raging sun lor..Damn hot yester..Then we carry on our endless search n found 1 shop hav lor..Then the bargain aunty also bargain till siao lor..Haha..After we bought it..We hav to walk from Mustafa to Race Course Road lor..Wahaha..All of us almost cao ta liao..The sun keep on shining on us lor..Haiz..After some monkey business at there..We took bus to toa payoh lor..Which is our so-called LD coach lar..Haha..In the bus,We 5 ppl slpet inside the bus like pigs lor..Haha..Soon..We reached there..Then tink only me was slping on his sofa lor..Cos the rest of them jus keep talking..Watch those LD Vcds..Haha..Then when i woke up,quite hungry,Cos of those Chicken Wings behind me..Haha..Wah,they quite steady leh,got food nv call me..Haha..Hmm..Awhile more,I was suprised by smth which is placed on the table..Wahaah..I very blur lor..Dono y suddenly got steamboat to eat leh..Haha..When eating,they keep calling me "Wen wen" cos of 1 person keep saying I looks like aqua!!Wah lao..Really meh?It happen after i got my hair cut lor..Sian..Haha..Then they also mention bout smth which only applies to guys lor..They call me..Next time if got ppl's soap dropped n jus land beside urs,u BETTER kick back!!Do not bend down to take the soap!!LOL..This i starting also dono lor..But now noe liao..Abit dirty la..But still need to becareful lor..They sae if u bend down,u will feel dirty n its an ugly thing to let others noe lor..Haha..U all guess wad's tat la..Dono ask me lor..After the dinner,we settled down n discuss bout smth happened in our LD troup lor..Haiz..Talked until this i also headache..Haha..Soon,the other guy called up and call me go downstairs n accompany him to eat..And he also treated me la..LOL..Wahahah..I becoming to fat liao la..If this carry on..LOL..When we went back n reached his home,Nth much happen lor..Then i awhile more went home liao..Ok la..Need to pay attention liao..Will blog tonite lor..

Omg..I cant believe myself will do homework..LOL..Tink mayb is tat Guai Kia fren said this sentence which make him look down on me,"Aiya,u confirm won do wan lor.."But now i've don finish liao..Haha..Hmm..Dono y n wad had happened to me this few days lor..Kinda lost in sch..Zzz..Yester nv post cos i went for my LD training then got things happened there n we went to coffee shop n they talked bout those things n competition..They talked n talked until the time reached 3.30am..Sian..I told them i tink canot slp liao..Cos if i slp confirm won get up wan lor..Ok..Bout yester,in sch,quite boring lor..Then i met this 'guai kia' lol..His face really looks like guai kia lor..But he also got some of my pattern la..Will talk cock lor..Wahhaa..Really like to meet this kind of ppl lor..Really can joke around so time pass fast..Haha..Then nth bout yester liao..Today,late but escape..Haha..Cos i meet Yihao at mrt n go sch toge..Then when we saw the gate is closed n those stupid ppl still walking towards the main gate n get detention..LOL..Then i call Yihao to walk backdoor in..Then we went n prefect caught us..So we said our class start at 9am not 8..LOL..But actually is start at 8 wan la..Bluff them..Wahahah..When they called us to take out our timetable i quickly said nv bring..Cos i scared Yihao stunt at there too long n will get spotted..Wahaha..Mus thx me leh..LOL..Hmm..Now jus finished my hmwk..Sian..Don really noe wad the account teacher teaching bout wad..All thx to my tat guai kia fren hav so much patience with me..Go through n explain to me hundreds of time which i also make him blur..LOL..Then after sch he said my brain cells died alot liao and also causing he's to die also..LOL..Jiao wei rite??Haha..Ok la..Now waiting for Long Xian to reach him then choing game with him liao..In the meanwhile i also go chiong cos done my hmwk liao..Haha..

Hmm...Today I late for sch lor..Tinking tat will tio detention..But in the end the prefect nv give the paper to me..Wahahah..Song man..Late also like tat..Haha..Today very tired lor..Cos yester not enough slp..Haiz..Went to class straight away then lie on my table to slp liao..Then tat bitch call me but i guyi don wan to ans her..Then She still use her dirty hands to touch my hands..Damn irritating lor..I really wan to tell her pls la, don i giv u face u don wan face lor..Bitch!! Early morning come n piss me..But i cant be bothered bout her..I rather be happy than angry for this kind of cold blooded bitch!! Wahahaha..Hmm..Today quite good lor..Actually sch ends at 3pm but the last 2 period was cancel so after our lunch we can go hm liao..Wahahah..Ok..Now i wana say this..Almost all my teachers are cute..Haha..Our form teacher today damn cute lor..The face looks like young children like tat..Short short wan..Then his cheek very chubby lor..Wahahah somemore today he shake his head n the meat on his face also shake..Wah lao..He like tat do makes me laugh for 2mins lor..Super cute leh..Haha..Then he monday gave us 1 small piece of paper..Call use to draw our strength and weakness..Then i draw -_- as my strength n my weakness is a ppl with one O as his head n lines for his body lor..Then the hands scatching the head n the other pointing dono wad..Then the teacher call other ppl to explain wad the drawer is implying to..Then until mine n tat monkey fren,no wan can guess lor..Haha..All no idea wad we are implying..LOL..Tat monkey more power..He draw his weakness almost like mine lor..but arounds his body like shaking like tat..Haha..Then teacher ask him wad's the meaning then he reply tat he jus anyhow draw wan..Then teacher still praise him tat he has the talent of drawing lor..Wahaha..Wana vomit lor..Haha..Hmm..After sch quite sian lor..Reach hm then play com le..Haiz..Long Xian today nv bring hp to sch so i can only play alone lor..Very sian leh..Now jus finish playing with him warcraft..Haiz..Actually the last round can win de lor..it's jus tat too lag for me to micro..Haiz..So lose to noobs..Sian..Now Zheng Yi n Long Xian go to slp liao..I guess i also going to slp le..BB..

Haiz..Nowadays sch damn boring..Tat monkey became not so steady to make noise together liao..Haiz..Today after my long sch hours which ended at 5pm..Went straight to Yio Chu Kang for training of LD..I already felt tired in sch cos there is really no kaki to talk to lor..All strangers in my class..Hardly noe them bout 1 week lor..Mayb there's more malays in my class?? But i'm not tat kind of ppl who judge or make frens by race lor..Haiz..Tink is i cant really get along with them good lor..Hmm..If compared my class to Yihao's class i would rather choose to be in his class lor..Cos more ppl to talk with..I like a loner in my class..Cant really communicate with them well..Haiz..In LD,I found out tat this time i talk the less wan lor..Usually i talk quite alot wan but dono leh..To me,today seems like another boring day which i really nv expected lor..Haiz..Now i totally no mood to do anything..Tink tml will not talk so much in sch liao..Gtg slp le..Cos tml need to reach sch by 8..Hope tml will be better..^_~

Today quite boring in sch lor..Haiz..Cos yester not enough slp..Yester choing gb with lx..Haha..Now feeling tat sch quite boring liao..At the 1st week quite fun but now beginning to sian liao lor..Haiz..Hmm..Today sch ends at 2.15..But raining heavily lor..So canot walk to interchange take bus..Haiz..Delay some time then tat monkey fren of mine go borrow umbrella then we shelter together lor..The 2 ppl no umbrella..Haha..Then i fall aslp in the bus..Almost slp over shot..Zzz...When i reached home..I feel not tired at all..Bcos of...My COMPUTER!!!LOL..Then i switched on my com n chiong liao..Haha..Next i quickly called long xian see where he is liao..He told me he's around paya lebar liao..Haha..So i chiong GB 1st..Choing until sudden i saw 1 msg,"yo" Then damn happy tat got ppl play with me liao..No need i play alone with ppl whom i don even noe..Haha..Choing a few rounds liao then we switched to warcraft..We played few rounds of dota..LOL..Super fun lor..But he always choing alone..Then karna killed..LOL..See la..Act too much pro liao la..Haha..Play until 9+ when my fren called me saying wana meet me..Then when i almost go out liao and i tink bout it..Don feel like going leh..Wan to choing gb with lx n sm..So i stay lor..Haha..Hmm..Tink his birthday got so many ppl help him celebrate liao..Got me go also like tat..So might as well don go..Haha..Hmm..Now stomach abit pain..Need to shit liao..Gtg..

Hmm..Today wake up quite early..Then switch on com n play games..Awhile longer Zheng Yi Logged in then play with him arranged team(AT) Quite fun lor..He still dono how to use his gold fully..Haha..But i mus admit tat he has improve lor..We win 2 rounds n lose 1 round bcos of he dropped off..Then Long Xian came in so we play 3s lor..Wah lao..Same thing happened..We win 2 rounds then lose 1 round bcos the 2 of them tio drop..Sian..Then when i come out liao zy afk..So lx n me play dota lor..Haha..Quite fun lor..Cos i always kio sai..Got the flag of 14-0 Woo!! Killed 14 heros n dead non..But the 1st dead i got is from those stupid creeps..Sian..Haha..Then after tat i went for my LD..Thought tat there will be training but no lor..Went there do the dao ju(equipments) Wah..This time the thing very fierce lor..Tink go out can eat ppl liao..Haha..Cos we are competing at taka lor..Canot lose face..LOL..Then now..I'm dying my hair back liao..Haiz..Time to sae goodbye to my gold hair..Quite sad lor..Cos of studies bobian..Haha..Time to play some games liao..Until my hair dry then go to bath..Haiz..Tml my fren's birthdae..Haha..Dono tues how to go sch..LOL..Gtg liao..Bye~..

Hmm..Today in sch ok lor..Quite boring..But at the end quite fun lor..Haha..Hmm...Today when reaching sch raining lor..Sian..Woo..Today's weather quite shiok man!! Nice for slping..But nv slp in class lor..Haiz..Today ended sch at 12pm..Then me n tat malay fren went home to together lor..Haha..Tat malay fren of mine hav a face like monkey!!LOL..Then i call him monkey lor..Then he call me mosquito..Haha..He's as tall as me lor..Haha..While 1 of our break and when we walking back to class..Tat monkey say tat we 2 like many ppl seeing us lor..Then i say tat u conquer the malay girls then i conquer the chinese girls..Haha..Meaning like in malay the girls eyeing on him lar..Then in chinese those girls eyeing on me lar..Haha..Like don1 face hor??LOL..Then ok..After sch..Me n him walking back..Then walk n walk..Both of us stomach pain..Wan to shit..Then he asked me go where shit??I sae go mac shit la..Then he reply a stupid question sae tat mac got toilet meh?? LOL..I shout at him sae tat WTF??U dono mac got toilet meh?? lol..Then nvm..We go inside there..Then begin to shit..At the start quite slience lor..Then i sae..Wah.. Shit inside air-con room shiok ah?? Then he at there laugh liao.. After tat..He say wah..Buey ta han leh..The shit damn smelly..LOL..Then i sae which shit is not smelly wan?? monkey shit everytime very smelly de ma.. Then nvm.. He flushed his shit away then shit again..Then we like mad ppl like tat..Laugh like hell lor..Then i sae..Don talk la..I canot concentrate to shit la..Then he still at there make noise until i sae..Knn.. My kick don hav already la..Only shit the 1st round..Actually wan to shit the 2nd round wan then u make me laugh until i canot shit liao..Then both of us laugh n laugh.. Then i sae knn..I end my shit liao la..Giv u make me until no feeling to shit liao la..Then he also end lor..Then come out we laugh until stomach cramp..Then i scold him..Hey..Ur face really like monkey leh..LOL..Then he sae knn ur face also looks like mosquito..LOL..Then we laugh there bout 5 mins lor..The whole toilet like our house toilet like tat..Haha..Today we 2 like mad lor..Quite fun la..Haha..Haiz..Gtg slp liao..Gd9.. ^_~

Ok..Now...I wan to tell all my frens tat pls don ever KPO until giv my info to any bitch lor..Knn..Today ok..I got pissed lor..1 of tat fucker who i don wish to see gave my info to the whole class..OMFG!! Shit her!!! This happened like this..I really dono how the fuck she got my hp number n email add..And dono which of my fucker frens gave her..Pls..Don ever giv those bitches like her.. Then my fren n i wrote rubbish on tat paper..Then this fucking bitch gave my real info..PLS..IF U ARE THE ONE READING THIS LET ME TELL U..I'M PISSED BY U TODAY N MY HATRED TO U HAS INCREASED!! PLS MIND UR OWN FUCKING BUSINESS!! SHIT U!!

Haiz..Today also exhausted lor..Wake up at bout 7.15am then reached there bout 8.30am.. Made Yihao wait 30mins..LOL...Then he say me always make him wait me for 30 mins lor..Haha..Cos yester also like tat..So today he fed up lor..So he say me..Haha..Hmm..Today abit happening lor..Cos got girls wana noe Jian Liang!!! But quite UGLY lor..Wahahah..There are 3 girls approach me there..Then 1 of them is wana noe Jl de..Then the one approached me wana noe me..Wahahaha...Die liao lah..Girls aimming at us...!!! LOL.. Then i still got disturb by those year 2 ppl lor..Haha..It happened like tat..Hmm..I got to noe 1 malay guy in my class..LOL..His frens also in Yihao's clas..Haha..Then when we hav our lunch together..After tat me n my fren lost our class..Then we sat at there 1st floor..Those year 2 girls all standing at the 2nd floor watching us..Do we really look like animals?? LOL..Then nvm..I went to the toilet with my malay fren which is located below them..Then they make sounds using their mouth lor..Sounds like rat's sound..LOL..Then nvm..We came out of toilet..And we decided to find our class..Then we climb up the stairs while they are standing beside the stairs,making more sounds...Haiz..Then when i spilt saliva on the floor..They reacted as"Ee..." Then i realised they are watching us...OMG..LOL..Haiz..Tat's all happened today lor..If got more interesting things happened I surely will blog it without hiding anything de..Haha..BB..Gtg slp liao..

Sad day..Yester reach hm bout 3am+ cos talk till midnite with LD ppl..Haiz..Then played games with lx till 4am then slp lor..Haiz..Then met Yihao at bishan interchange..The moment I reach there he told me tat the uniform there sucks!!!Looks like banquet waiter lor..Wah lao..Really damn er xin leh..Haiz..Then reach tat sucky sch liao then they told us to go canteen..But nth was there..WTF??Tat gives me a very bad impression lor..They like organise not proper..Fuck tat sch..Then sit at the open hall until 10am+..Till the sun light shining all our head lor..Damn hot lor..Then mus sit there hear their er xin de ppl sing songs there lor..Haiz..After tat nvm,They made us sung 3 times their fucking ITE song..Damn bo liao lor...Dono y they all almost same age as us but do things differently..Haiz..Still looks childish lor..Haiz..Then more sian prob came up lor..I'm different class with Yihao!!!WTF??Haiz..The whole class I'm alone..With tat person who I don wana see FOREVER!!!Really pissed me off lor..Haiz..At the ava room really will make ppl slp lor..Haha..At first I fall aslp 1st..Then Yihao at there lie down lor..Then the teacher there wake me up then I told her tat I'm not slping lor..Jus watching my beautiful shoes..Then she scold me...OMG!!Damn ill-mannered teacher lor..Haiz..Sian liao..Today tink is the most sian day lor!!!ITE really pissed me off~!!Err...Don wana talk more bout tat stupid n idiotic sch liao..Tml we going to skip tat wad stupid water game..Going off after lunch liao..Wahahahah..Gtg slp liao..BB..o.O

Wahahahah..Woo..Today is the competition liao..Haha..Hmm..Yester slp at around 4am then wake up at 8am..Slept only 4 hours..Haiz..Quite tiring lor..But no choice..Haha..Hmm..Reached Yio Chu Kang at 9.33am(according to my hp time) but they said need to reach there by 10am..Haiz..So I'm the 1st wan to reach there..Haha..1st time hor..LOL..Hmm..In the bus got happen 1 funny thing lor..1 bee fly inside the bus..It is like 2 inch long..Hmm..When I saw it,I keep observe it lor..Then I realise tat it's flying near to me liao then i shift my place to the back..LOL..Scared of it sting me then I cant go competition liao..Haha..Quite scary lor..The bee keep 'banging' the glass of the bus..Hmm..I tink tat bee saw trees outside so it thought of flying towards lor..Then I noe tat it keep using its 'hand' to rub it's face..Haha..Quite interesting lor..Haha..Then when everything is well prepared,we pray to the gods of the temple at Yio Chu Kang lor..Pray until all of us making at there curse n swear cos the temple is 3 temple merge toge then we mus pray all 3 temple's god..Haha..1 temple need to pray bout 4 times lor..Haiz..Then the praying session haven end yet..We also went to Geylang lor 25 there n pray our own temple lor..Although already seperated,still need to giv some respect lor..Haha..Then lastly we went to Grylang lor 3(Upper Boon Keng Rd) to do our last praying..Haiz..Then we ate our breakfast bout 12pm+..Haiz..Ate breakfast at noon??LOL..Hmm..Then when we are rdy to go to Changkak Changi CC(Competition's place) Its bout 1pm+ liao..And we need to report there by 12.30pm..OMG!! I was worrying lor..Then they say 2 ppl of ours went there n report for us liao..Only then I can relax lor..Haha..Hmm..Reach there liao..The 1st team also almost start but we(ppl who are inside the competition) do the praying there lor..Pray to those 'thing' telling them tat pls bao yiu we soon soon lor..Haha..Hmm..Then all we did is at there wait lor..Cos we are the number 7th team ma..Haiz..I at there almost slp liao..LOL..Really not excited at all lor..Haha..No feeling liao..Haha..Then ok..After our team finished the perform and after the referee said our points is 8.50(which is highest there^_^) 1 of my senior at there shouted out LD's Troup Name Say We Good Or Not?!?! Then we replied as GOOD~!!!..LOL..Very Fun lor..Then nvm..After the last team's points is showed..The same senior of mine went to his lorry..Hit the horn 2 times..And we shouted Our LD's Troup Name..Haha..Very fun lor..Can see all ppl's teeth..LOL..And we shouted tat while we are on the lorry and its parked jus directly infront of the competition hall..LOL..It makes all ppl at there watching us.. Haha..Now the points of every team I got recorded..Hmm.. The 1st team=8.22,2nd=8.33,3rd=8.22(-0.1),4th=8.22,5th=7.65(-0.8),6th=8.42,7th(tat's us ^_^)=8.50,8th(last team)=8.33.. Haha..Which LD team I won mention their name lor..Haha..It's a really exciting match lor..Then also quite funny lor..When it's bout our turn,The drummer very nervous..LOL..U won noe how nervous he was until u saw his face turning green..Haha..I'm not nervous at all lor..Haha..Hmm..Quite good lor..Today's result..Haha..We got 1st at the east zone traditional LD competition lor..Hmm..But also got bad pts lor..Still need to practice liao..Haha..We qualify in the finals which is held at Orchard's Taka!!So u all mus go support us hor..No more excuses liao lor..^^ And we went back to Changkak Changi CC to watch the Lion jump on those 'poles' But we go not only go there to watch..But to take our Jiang Pei!! Haha..Jus when the commentator going to say our LD's troup name..He says this,"Today's,THe Year 2004,LD Traditional Champion is..."Then same senior jus as above shouted,"IT'S US!!!" Then all of us laughed very loud till the whole ppl over there watched us..Haha.. Very fun lor..Hmm..Tink of tml need to go sch spoilted my mood lor..Haiz..Need to wake up at early morning..Haiz..Gtg play games with LX now..Cos he now on phone with me..Haha..BB..

Woo~...Tml is the competition liao..Haiz..Finally reached liao..Hmm..Although few of my frens buey steady..Nv go see see..Haha..But nvm..Tink we can make it to the semi-finals lor..Then the place will me held at Orchard's Taka there lor..Then u all go see also not too late bah..Haha..Haiz..Another headache thing coming liao..Tat is stupid ITE opening..Haiz..Sian..ITE so sian..If can go poly more better lor..Got more mood liao..But I mus also accept the fact rite?? =( Although now has come to this stage liao but "Wad To Do?" Haha..I always use this sentence de hor..Haiz...Now late liao..Time to Z_Z..Haha..Tml still need to wake up at 8am..Then make my things then go Yio Chu Kang..Haiz...One thing to share also lor..I today cut my hair liao..Then tio suan by my LD frens,saying tat i looks like aqua..Wahahahah..Cos today train the last time ma..Can or canot also go lor..Haha..Hmm...Tink got pic la..Cos i use my frens hp to take de..Then call him send me..Haha..If got mayb i'll put lor..Haha..Ok la..Going to Zzz.. Take Care~!!

Finally,I'm going to hav more time on computer liao..^_^ Wahahaha..Sian..Still got 2 more days to go..Haiz..Wan to end this asap liao..This competition cre8ed lots of prob but nvm..Guess all will be going to hav a FullStop liao..But things will nv be the same again..Haiz..Btw,I hav only 2 words to say,"Hack Care" Not going to care LD things liao..Jus carry on my studies as sch opening..Haiz,another headache coming liao..=( Cos gotta be so call "same class" with some1 who i dislike to see n talk with..Hmm..Tat person I tink my frens noe who liao so i won elaborate more bout tat sickening person..Wahahah..Hmm..Today finally got to slp longer..From 5am till 3pm, but still NOT enough..Haha..Tink everything is over then I can slp longer liao..Btw,QQ,I haven advertise ur blog leh..Haha..Paisey no time..~_~ Ok..His blog add is http://www.shuyin-x2.blogspot.com/ so mus support his blog~!! QQ ah..He's my fren since pri sch lor..Every year also same class with him..Although some years not same..Haha..But we like go a big round then be together again..Haha..Hmm..QQ and I like very got yuan fen lor..Cos his father n my father same sch,me n him same sch n my sis n he's same..Wahahaha quite funny lor..Mayb next time my children n he's going to b same bah..Haha..But tink back,I won get marry so soon or mayb not lor..Haha.. Gtg gaming liao..BB.. Take Care guys..

Haiz..Quite a number of things happened..I am tired of caring lion dance's things n i won giv a fucking damn on it anymore!! Haiz..Too tired to write this thing n no mood to carry on to write... Gd nite o.O

Wahahaha..Sian..More n more ppl using this thing liao...Haiz..Need to help them advertise..Wahahahah..See I steady bo~!!Lol..My fren's blog add is http://catshell.blogspot.com/ so pls support~!!Haiz..Tat blog is Shi Miao de..She jus told me so i write it here lor..Ma Fun~o.O Haha..Jus reached hm from helping out at my fren's shen tang..Then went to lion dance there tie up the dragon for tml's event..Haiz..Need to reached Upper Boon Keng Rd at 8am..Sian...Tink today not going to slp liao..-_-" Cos scared overslept n tio 'BLOW'..Haha..Hmm..Today tink quite fun lor..But only somethings really pissed me out.. =( Haiz..Nvm..Tink jus forget it cos i won giv a damn to such things anymore..Jus wana be happy n relax everyday..^_^ Being pissed everyday still a day,being happy still a day,y don ppl be happy rather than pissed?Haiz..The humankind is complicated..Jus don talk so much n do wadever ppl ask u to do n tats it..Don giv any suggestion cos it may mislead others by insulting their ideas..Worst come to worst it may start a fight..So he bi ner?? Haiz..Tink next time then write wad stupid things tat bitch had done..Cos today need to advertise tat extra girl's blog...LOL... (o_~)

Hmm..Today start sch at 9,then meet my 'ah gua' fren who is the gb kaki..Haha..At eunos 8.15am..Then go sch..Reach sch feel sian liao..Haiz..1st 2 period is accounting..Wahahah..Now the teacher teach de is from sec sch wan..EOA ah?! The petty cash book..Sian..Then tat ah gua fren of mine always call me let him copy but i nv! Cos it will only hai him...

Wahahah..Long time nv don slp for 1 day liao..Now my whole body shaking..LOL..Ok..Yester me n my LD frens sat at AMK the S-11 kopi diam until 4am this morning..Wahahah..Then i reached home bout 4.30am..Then scared overslept so might as well don slp lor..Haha..Actually don wan to slp now..But really shaking liao..Head feeling like 50kg heavier than normal days..Zzz...Sian...Some more today still got PE!! LOL..But ok la..I also slack while doing PE..After PE is IT,I fall aslp 2 times until teacher bobian,so she stand beside me..LOL..Watching me do all the work..Haha..In sch i tink only slp .

Everytime when i'm feeling down,I wish u were here..Jus looking at u,and talk even jus 1~2 sentence,I jus feel good..And only u can do tat..Doesnt noe the reason..But by these funny things i feel,does it mean i like u?_? But y i doesn't feel it tat way?But even it really does,how am i going to tell u? Even if i let u noe,wad's ur reaction? I jus don hav the courage to let u noe..If i really gather all my courage to let u noe,and u accept me..I tink it jus not the feeling i'm having now..This feeling is really strange..On the other hand,if u rejected me,i guess it only make both of us into cold war...And there's nth i can do..Only can secretly tink of u?_? Now,we are seperate..Hopelessly me tat can do is to wait..Waiting for our fate to come and bring us together..But does tat work? Jus wana let u noe tat no matter how far we are being seperate,I jus noe tat one day,we'll meet someday..And by tat time..I'll let u noe.. T_T

Haiz..Today wake up at 11am+..Sian..Miss the tourney of warcraft..~_~ Then play abit of warcraft lor...Played dota..Then switched to Gb..Met LX..Wahaha...Play gb bo jio leh..LOL..Then he sae tat soon ming got wad tourney la...At jurong...LOL..So far..Later if we canot go see how?? Also LL mus go home..Haha..Whole day at home play com lor..Nth to do..Actually today got choing de..Then fren pang tua..Msg him also nv reply..WTF??Don1 go sae la..No need to tua de lor..Haiz.. Sian now so come to update blog lor..hmm... Jus call my other fren..Asking whether he got chiong anot...He sae wait he go home see whether he got car anot..Haha..But go there i only noe him nia..Quite sian..But at home also sian lor..Wan to go choing!!! Wahahah...Hmm..Dono wana say today or yester?? Cos its after 12am liao..Haha..Hmm..Morning while going to sch,I went to bishan mrt's Toilet to SHIT again~! Dono y every morning feel like shitting leh..Wah,the toilet there shiok leh..Got fan wan..The more the fan blow u the more u wana shit lor..Haha..But this time only I one person nia la..Haha..When reached sch,I rushed the hmwk given on Fri cos Sat & Sun got LD lor..Sun is our girl's team competition..Haha..Haiz..They should go into finals de..But those cai pan Kelong lor..We also canot do anything..Wad To Do!?!?! Haiz.. Then when Sun reach hm liao,wana do hmwk tat time then discovered tat my TEXTBOOK put in sch..Sian 100% liao..Then choing game..Haha..Eh,3/4 of sch hours quite sian lor..No happening..BUT!! When until the last period,My wire inside my brain quite loose liao..LOL..Making too much noise lor..Almost the whole class only got me talking nia..Haha..Then my "cute cute" form teacher reach liao..Then we are discussing bout the National Day things..Say whether wearing wad traditional shirt la..Then only me who at there shout,"Don wear la..Waste time only,Wear also like tat.." I totally disagree lor..Then the teacher abit buey ta han me liao..He indirectly signal me by talking to another fren,saying"I don like students to talk when i'm talking,If u really wan to talk i'll send u out of the class" When i on the way,turning to face teacher..The teacher BLOW ME!!! Shouted my name very loud and clear..Muahaha..Say tat,"Yyyuuu Weenn!! If u really wan to talk pls go out of the class.. U wan to stay inside the class or stand outside??!!" Then I jus simply repiled tat,"I wan to sit down here..Cher,Sorry!!" Muahahah...When i saying this to him,I was happy like fuck lor..Haha..The more he angry the more i happy..LOL..1 time see him so angry leh..Haha..Dono y i still can laugh lor..Abit siao rite??? =) Then he returning us the work tat passed up last week by calling us 1 by 1 go up n take,then i very excited leh..Haha..I prepare tat if he BLOW me again i surely take my things n go home de..LOL..Even LD competition not as exciting as this u noe?? Wahaha... When my turn,I walk to him with a =), then all ppl dono wana laugh or prepare to see whether i'll get anymore scolding anot lor..But he jus talk nicely to me lor..Ok ah..The work is bout writing a notice la.. Then i write Attention To All Customers,And my the customers is written next line lor..Then the teacher blur blur..Help me add Notice TO Customers and sae i wrong..Almost like tat:- Attention to all
